data.title: ​​Amitabh Bachchan, Shabana Azmi, Dhanush: Actors with the most National Award wins
data.meta_description: From Shabana Azmi winning 5 National Awards to Amitabh Bachchan taking home 4, here's a list of actors with the most National Award wins.
data.text:
Shabana Azmi

With 5 National Awards to her name Shabana Azmi, currently holds the record for the most wins. She won her first Best Actress award for Lakshmi in 1974. She went on to win 3 consecutive years for her roles in the films Arth, Khandhar and Paar. She also won the award for her role in 'Godmother'.

Amitabh Bachchan

Amitabh Bachchan won the National Award four times. He won his first award for Agneepath in 1990. He also took home awards for Black, Paa and Piku.

Kangana Ranaut

Kangana Ranaut was the first actress to win two National awards in the same year. She won her first award for Queen and went on to win her second for Tanu Weds Manu. She checked herself in the record books when she won for Manikarnika: The Queen of Jhansi and Panga.

Ajay Devgn

Bollywood star Ajay Devgn is also a three-time National Award winner. The actor won the prestigious award for his roles in Zakhm, The Legend of Bhagat Singh and Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior.
